posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. posts.text: 我的HTML基础练习 html老杜练习 // js中的内置类：date // 获取系统当前时间 var nowTime = new Date(); document.write(nowTime); document.write("<br>"); // 转换成具有本地语言环境的日期格式 nowTime2 = nowTime.toLocaleString(); document.write(nowTime2); document.write("<br>"); // 重点：获取毫秒数 var times = nowTime.getTime(); document.write(times); </script> <h1>标题字</h1> <h2>标题字</h2> <h3>标题字</h3> <h4>标题字</h4> <h5>标题字</h5> <h6>标题字</h6> <hr> <p> hello world </p> <pre> hello world </pre> <del>删除字</del> <ins>插入字</ins> <b>粗体字</b> <i>斜体字</i> <table border="1px" width="50%"> <thead> <tr> <th>id</th> <th>name</th> <th>money</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>1</td> <td>2</td> <td>3</td> </tr> <tr> <td>4</td> <td>5</td> <td rowspan="2">69</td> </tr> <tr> <td colspan="2">78</td> </tr> </tbody> <tfoot> <tr> <td>a</td> <td>a</td> <td>a</td> </tr> </tfoot> </table> <!-- 表单以action?name=提交数据给服务器的 --> <form action="http://www.baidu.com" method="GET"> <!-- 画按钮可以使用input输入域，type=“submit”的时候表示该按钮是一个提交按钮， 具有提交表单的能力，button不行，表示普通按钮 --> 用户名<input type="text" name="user" value="lihua"/> <br> 男<input type="radio" name="gender" value="1"/> 女<input type="radio" name="gender" value="0"/> <br> 兴趣爱好 <input type="checkbox" name="gender" value="sing"/>唱歌 <input type="checkbox" name="gender" value="dance"/>跳舞 <input type="checkbox" name="gender" value="play"/>玩游戏 <br> 学历<select name="grade" onchange="alert(this.value)"> <option value="gz">高中</option> <option value="bk" selected>本科</option> <option value="ss">硕士</option> </select> <br> 简介<textarea rows="10" cols="40" name="introduce"> </textarea> <br> <input type="submit" value="注册"/> <input type="reset" value="清空"/> </form> <br> <input type="file"> <br><br> <script> // (1)用户名不能为空 // (2)用户名必须在6-14位之间 // (3)用户名只能有数字和字母组成，不能含有其他符号（正则表达式） // (4)密码和确认密码一致，邮箱地址合法 // (5)统一市区焦点验证 // (6)错误提示信息统一在span标签中提示，并且要求自提12号，红色 // (7)文本框再次获得焦点后，清空错误提示信息如果文本框中数据不合法要求清空文本框 // (8)最终表单中的所有项均合法方可提交 window.onload = function(){ //给用户名文本框绑定blur实践 var usernameElt = document.getElementById("username"); var usernameErrorSpan = document.getElementById("usernameError"); usernameElt.onblur = function(){ // 获取用户名 var username = usernameElt.value; // 去除前后空白 username = username.trim(); // 判断用户名是否为空 if(username === ""){ // alert("用户名为空"); usernameErrorSpan.innerText = "用户名为空"; } else{ // 继续判断长度6-14 if(username.length < 6 || username.length > 14){ usernameErrorSpan.innerText = "用户名长度必须在[6-14]之间"; } else{ // 继续判断是否有特殊字符 var regExp = /^[A-Za-z0-9]+$/; var ok = regExp.test(username); if(ok){ // 用户名最终合法 usernameErrorSpan.innerText = "用户名可用"; }else{ // 用户名有特殊符号 usernameErrorSpan.innerText = "用户名有特殊符号"; } } } } // 给username这个文本框绑定获得焦点事件 usernameElt.onfocus = function(){ // 清空非法用户名 if(usernameErrorSpan.innerText == "用户名为空"){ usernameElt.value = ""; // 清空span usernameErrorSpan.innerText = ""; } } // 获取确认密码框对象 var pwd2Elt = document.getElementById("pwd2"); var pwdErrorSpan = document.getElementById("pwdError"); // 绑定blur事件 pwd2Elt.onblur = function(){ // 获取密码和确认密码 var pwdElt = document.getElementById("pwd"); var userpwd = pwdElt.value; var userpwd2 = pwd2Elt.value; if(userpwd != userpwd2){ // 密码不一致 pwdErrorSpan.innerText = "密码不一致"; }else{ // 密码一致 } } // 绑定focus事件 pwd2Elt.onfocus = function(){ if(pwdErrorSpan.innerText != ""){ pwd2Elt.value = ""; } pwdErrorSpan.innerText == ""; } // 获取email的span var emailSpan = document.getElementById("emailError"); // 给email绑定blur事件 var emailElt = document.getElementById("email"); emailElt.onblur = function(){ // 获取email var email = emailElt.value; // 编写正则 var emailRegExp = /^\w+([-+.]\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*$/; var ok = emailRegExp.test(email); if(ok){ }else{ emailSpan.innerText = "邮箱地址不合法"; } } // 给emailElt绑定focus emailElt.onfocus = function(){ if(emailSpan.innerText != ""){ emailElt.value = ""; } emailSpan.innerText = ""; } var submitBtnElt = document.getElementById("submitBtn"); submitBtnElt.onclck = function(){ usernameElt.focus(); usernameElt.blur(); pwd2Elt.focus(); pwd2Elt.blur(); emailElt.focus(); emailElt.blur(); if(usernameErrorSpan.innerText == "" && pwdErrorSpan.innerText == "" && emailSpan.innerText == ""){ var userFormElt = document.getElementById("userForm"); userFormElt.submit(); } } } </script> <form id="userForm" action="" method="GET"> 用户名<input type="text" name="username" id="username"/><span id="usernameError"></span><br> 密码<input type="text" name="pwd" id="pwd"/><br> 确认密码<input type="text" name="pwd2" id="pwd2"/><span id="pwdError"></span><br> 邮箱<input type="text" name="email" id="email"/><span id="emailError"></span><br> <input type="button" value="注册" id="submitBtn"/> <input type="reset" value="重置"/> </form> <iframe src="老杜-学习.html" height="300px" width="600px"></iframe> <script> var data = { "total" : 4, "emps" : [ {"empno":123,"ename":"SMITH","sal":800.0}, {"empno":124,"ename":"JACK","sal":900.0}, {"empno":125,"ename":"MARIA","sal":700.0}, {"empno":126,"ename":"JOJO","sal":600.0}, ] } window.onload = function(){ var displayEmp = document.getElementById("emp"); displayEmp.onclick = function(){ var tableHtml = ""; for(var i = 0 ; i < data.emps.length ; i++){ tableHtml += "<tr>"; tableHtml += "<td>" + data.emps[i].empno + "</td>"; tableHtml += "<td>" + data.emps[i].ename + "</td>"; tableHtml += "<td>" + data.emps[i].sal + "</td>"; tableHtml += "</tr>"; } document.getElementById("tableEmp").innerHTML = tableHtml; } } </script> <br><br> <input type="button" value="显示员工信息列表" id="emp" onclick="" /> <h2>员工信息列表</h2> <hr> <table border="1px" width="50%"> <thead> <tr> <th>员工编号</th> <th>员工名字</th> <th>员工薪资</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody id="tableEmp"> </tbody> </table>
